name: Bandit-Prototype
description:
This a small project to learn how to utilize the features and tools provided by the Unity Engine. The project is strictly in 2D using free assets found online

 HOW TO PLAY                                                                                                                                                WASD - Move your character around the Scene.                                                                         ESC - Pause Menu

Walk around the tall grass in the lower section of the map to activate a random battle.
